text: "Ra <5v TTHrif gfea5<ot (73w5 4Rdev & RTHPf FAT4, 4Ra TRaFT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) FH T 0i-5 Q 6, 77zr-10, #RqT, 78f focff 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TH9 /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ HAM Projects /2022 Policy Circular no. 8.4.34/2022 dated 7th July, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ NHAI/GM(F) /HAM/-Interest/2020 (Comp.No. 46658)} Sub:: Interest Rate Applicable for HAM Projects-Interest under clause 23.6.4- reg: This is with regard to the amended Model Concession Agreement for Hybrid Annuity Model Projects. As per the requirement of Article 23.6.4 "Interest shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one year MCLR of top 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks plus 1.25% The foot note specifies that "The Authority shall declare the list of Top 5 Schedule Commercial Bank on Ist September every calendar year based on the balance sheet size as declared in their annual reports, The year MCLR of the top 5 Scheduled commercial banks shall be taken at the start of every quarter". 2 _ Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Schedule Commercial banks with one year MCLR (Rate of Interest) applicable as on 1st July, 2022. The list of banks shall be next reviewed on 1st September 2022 and the rates shall be published for Ist of every quarter. 3 The rates for the top 5 commercial banks are as below: Sr_ No. Bank' s Name One Year MCLR in % (As Average Rate Applicable for on 01.07.2022) the period 01.07.2022 to 30.09.2022 State Bank of India 7.40 2 HDFC Bank 7.85 3_ ICICI Bank 7.75 7.61% per annum 4 Bank of Baroda 7.50 PLUS 1.25% 5 _ PNB 7.55 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. o2/o21 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
